channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OH

item.title: Report E-2024100685
item.description:
Report E-2024100685

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-31T09:22:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-02
  • City: HEBRON
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLEAN HARBORS ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: At 1230et the where houseman was loading the trailer for shipment when putting the next tote in the valve was struck on the tote next to it breaking the valve off that tote. The contents then leaked out onto the floor of the trailer with a proximately 15gallons going into the containment at the back of the trailer in the dock. The material was contained to the trailer and the containment at the dock. They had a crew come in and clean the material up and all was completed by 0230et.
